name: BGC: 2 Player Games
description:
Games for two, three, four players that can be played on one device (phone or tablet). For a family evening, for a long trip, for a party, and a group of friends. Playing together on the same device is always fun, and the four of them are even more fun. Games designed for attention, reaction, thinking and accuracy. Simple and clear rules. Good luck in victory!

Features of the collection of games:

★ 8 exciting mini-games
★ Party Games
★ Challenge friends and family
★ Game mode with bots
★ Multiplayer 2 to 4 players

Battle Games Collection - These are great games for 2 - 4 players to have fun.
